title: Developer needed for website - Car Pricing Guide
snippet:
Looking for an experienced programmer that can build/design the front and back end.

qualifications:

- build on a platform that is Linux compatible 
- experience with database management and integration
- able to design pricing tables
- familiar with SEO practices and link structures
- build a took to scrape data and import it through the proper filters

Please only apply if you are ready to start work right away.
